page.title: 09MARK MOOR MEDICAL SERVICES
page.content: Medical Services, Surgeries both medical & dental are available in several places all are situated up to 5 miles away from most houses. There is a choice of several General Practitioners with modern facilities. People may need to travel 20 miles or more to visit hospitals and may go to one in any of the several surrounding Towns though there is a Cottage Hospital within 6 miles. A casualty service is available here except at night. Chemists, the nearest chemists are at least five miles away from houses but close to surgeries.
